article_title: Bionic Eye Implant Gives Man A Chance To See His Wife For The First Time In A Decade
article_text: An Oklahoma bill that could send any doctor who performs an abortion to jail headed to the governor on Thursday, with opponents saying the measure is unconstitutional and promising a legal battle against the cash-strapped state if it is approved.

article_metadata.news_keywords: bionic, eye, implant, gives, man, chance, see, his, wife, first, time, decade

og.description: Alan Zderad, 68, is the 15th person to receive a bionic eye implant.
